channel.title: Congrats to JamesKane
channel.description:
So, I don't know if anyone else knew this, but everyone's favorite Black Mesa programmer [url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/member.php?u=199']JamesKane[/url] (Mark Abent) has gotten himself a pretty nice gig. He's working under the direction Chris Roberts, the man who created Wing Commander, on a triple A budget crowdunded game called [url='https://www.robertsspaceindustries.com']Star Citizen[/url]. You can actually watch him each week on a segment called Bugsmashers on a show called Around the Verse which is a show that keeps backers informed about game progress.
So, congrats to Mark! Your future in the game industry is looking bright. :slight_smile:
If you want to see him in Around the Verse, you can watch episodes [url='https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLVct2QDhDrB290jDIeV9fTTq-X8Kt49nX']here[/url].

item.title: Congrats to JamesKane
item.dc:creator: Istapp
item.description:
Yeah, Mark has become something of a celebrity in the community.

I’m curious, how many of you guys on the forum here are SC backers?

Read full topic

item.title: Congrats to JamesKane
item.dc:creator: John_Lemon
item.description:
Amazing stuff! Star Citizen almost scares me with how ambitious it seems! Way to go James!

Read full topic

item.title: Congrats to JamesKane

item.description:
So, I don’t know if anyone else knew this, but everyone’s favorite Black Mesa programmer JamesKane (Mark Abent) has gotten himself a pretty nice gig. He’s working under the direction Chris Roberts, the man who created Wing Commander, on a triple A budget crowdunded game called Star Citizen.
